#summary Join Collaboration
#labels Use-Case

*Case Number:* UC006

*Case Name:* Join Collaboration

*Description:* An ISERN member wants to join an existing collaboration.

*Actors:*
  * Researcher – An ISERN member
  * System – The MyISERN application

*Frequency:* Below Average

*Preconditions:*
  * The researcher is viewing the homepage.
  * The researcher has a profile in the system.

*Postconditions:*
  * The researcher is part of the collaboration.

*Basic Course:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| 1. The researcher clicks on the view collaborations link. || 2. The system loads a list of all existing collaborations. ||
|| 3. The researcher looks for the collaboration he wishes to join and clicks on the edit collaboration link. || 4. The system loads the join collaboration form. ||
|| 5. The researcher adds his name to the collaborating researchers, and enters his comment that states why he's joining.  He also enters his name as an author of the commend. ||  ||
|| 6. The researcher clicks on the save button. || 7. The system adds the new information into the collaboration. ||
||  || 8. The system sends email notifications to researchers associated with the collaboration stating that the collaboration has been changed. ||
||  || 9. The system tells the researcher that the change to the collaboration was successful and loads the homepage. ||

*Alternate Course A:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| A.5. The researcher incorrectly inputs his name on the list of collaborating researchers. ||  ||
|| A.6. The researcher clicks on the save button. || A.7. The system tells the researcher that his name is not to the system. ||
||  || A.8. The system tells the researcher to make sure he didn't make a typo. ||

*Alternate Course B:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| B.5. The researcher incorrectly enters his name in the comment author name field. ||  ||
|| B.6. The researcher clicks on the save button. || B.7. The system tells the researcher that the name on the comment author name field was not found. ||
||  || B.8. The system tells the researcher to make sure he didn't make a typo. ||
